mutants.mutated_line: lst = [i for i in lst if i % 4 == 0]
mutants.code:
def rearrange_list(lst):
    lst = [i for i in lst if i % 4 == 0]
    lst.sort(key=lambda x: (bin(x).count('1'), x))
    return lst
